text: I'm too worried to do that.
[url=ACTION-PRAY]Praying[/url] could help me feel better.
My [url=EQUIP-LEFT]left hand[/url] can carry it.
I'm already carrying something in my [url=EQUIP-LEFT]left hand[/url].
My [url=EQUIP-RIGHT]right hand[/url] can carry it.
I'm already carrying something in my [url=EQUIP-RIGHT]right hand[/url].
[url=USE]Unlock[/url] with $USE_ITEM?
It's locked.
It's the key to the basement.
Judging by how many books I own, it's easy to see how smart I am.
I'll try reading one of them next week.
I hate to think about how much time I spend lying there.
Once I reach godhood, my first miracle will be to eradicate the need for sleep.
My second miracle.{pause=500}.{pause=500}.{pause=500} Free donuts.
The door leads up to [url=ENTER]the floor above[/url].
The hatch leads down to [url=ENTER]the floor below[/url].
The [url=ENTER]apartment corridor[/url].
This is [url=ENTER]my room[/url].
My [url=ENTER]landlord[/url] lives here.
[url=ENTER]The basement[/url].
You're room 101 right?
Listen, I've got a lot of shit going on right now. [url=LANDLORD_RENT_001]Rent[/url] is due so please hand it in.
What, you don't have it?
Ugh, [url=LANDLORD_THESTATE_001]The State[/url] is gonna rip me a new one.
Suppose you could solve [url=LANDLORD_ISSUE_001]this issue[/url] for me, and I'll figure something out with your rent.
Otherwise we're both dead meat...
Yeah, The State, the one above.
Big brother, high lord, large man.
You know...
Look, don't tell anyone in the building about this...
We've got a problem. A big one. The size of a rat. A big rat.
You get the idea. The key to the basement is in a drawer somewhere.
Are we clear of [url=LANDLORD_ISSUE_002]the rats[/url] yet?
